about_the_game:
This software is a collection of VRM data assets created to meet the specifications of "RPG Maker 3D Character Converter."
This will be the Gee-kun-soft character "Witch" version.

With the 3D Character Converter, you can create walking graphics and other assets for RPG Maker Unite.


Not only for the 3D Character Converter but, this VRM data can be used for dancing in other VRM-compatible software. It can also be employed on platforms like Unity to create your own unique games. Additionally, you can utilize them as Virtual YouTubers as well.

*******************************************
7-Body Proportions, 10 Characters
10 VRM Files

1. Purple Hair, Gold Eyes, Long Hair, Cat Ears
2. Yellow-Green Hair, Blue Eyes, Long Hair
3. Purple Hair, Red Eyes, Long Hair
4. Purple Hair, Green Eyes, Ponytail, Large Bust
5. Green Hair, Black Eyes, Short Hair, Large Bust
6. Black Hair, Black Eyes, Short Hair, Two-side Up
7. Purple Hair, Purple Eyes, Long Hair, Large Bust
8. Brown Hair, Blue Eyes, Pigtails, Large Bust
9. Purple Hair, Purple Eyes, Long Hair, Two-side Up, Large Bust
10. Silver Hair, Blue Eyes, Medium Long Hair, Large Bust
*******************************************
